channel.title: Acheron v1 (317)
channel.description:
[size=10pt]Acheron V1[/size] :D
Coming soon... world #1 rsps from finland stay tuned acheron is coming out on 21th April 2015
We got: Dungeoneerin + rewards Pk'ing + pk points system Dicing Clan Chat Lootshare Many Bosses Great stabil Economy system Awesome staff team Staking + Duel arena Barrows Donator system Player shops Loyalty titles Many minigames Skilling area Working slayer + rewards Custom bosses Vote points + shop Custom Godswords New Xp ratios XP lock Donator options donator island Many starter shops all skills working money pouch reciepe for disaster correct emotions
more coming.. for example: Vote system adding new spirits couple quests dungeoneering for donators more shops
See you soon in my server!! ;)
Adding pics and maybe vids soon! stay tuned!
